td.content: shows nodular aggregates of basalioma cells are present in the dermis and exhibit peripheral palisading and retraction, melanin is also present within the tumor and in the surrounding stroma

td.content: s:pt c/o 4 days h/o moderate ulcer on left elbow (not checked), moderate ulcer with irregular borders that sometime crusts or bleeds, moderate painful ulcer on the top of lower lip. Denies ever using tobacco describes drinking an average of 12 drinks a week for about 2 years in his past o:Height 68 in, Weight 202 lbs, Temperature 98.3 F, Pulse 71, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 15 a:Skin Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to oncology.

td.content: s:patient presents with 2 years history of moderate painful ulcer on the top of lower lip, moderate ulcer on left elbow and moderate ulcer with irregular borders that sometime crusts or bleeds. patient is a 58 yo male. o:Height 68 in, Weight 201 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15 a:Skin Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed 5-FU - 0.5 g topical cream, and ordered Shave biopsy.
